node.title: Offsetra Accepts BTT. Support High Quality Carbon Reduction Initiatives with BTT
node.content:
Offsetra, the company that allows you to offset your individual or business activity by supporting high-quality carbon reduction initiatives, now accepts BTT. What’s a carbon offset? An offset unit represents the removal of one tonne of carbon dioxide equivalent (t CO2e) from the atmosphere or the avoidance of one tonne of emissions. Offset units are generated and sold by projects that deliver measurable reductions in greenhouse gas emissions.

“We’re thrilled to partner with BitTorrent to provide an easy way to acquire and retire verified carbon tonnes with BTTs,” said Damien Schuster, Co-Founder of Offsetra. “Offsetra is a huge proponent of crypto currencies in providing novel ways to fund climate finance projects.”

Offsetra sources all of its credits from verified projects listed on the APX carbon registry. These include certified credits from renewable energy, reforestation initiatives, and methane capture. By offsetting your emissions through Offsetra, you are helping humanity move toward a carbon neutral and environmentally friendly future.

To begin carbon offsetting today, please visit https://offsetra.com, click ‘Offset Now’, and then select Crypto Currencies when you reach the payment section.
